meanings.sent1: The fizzy drink tickled my nose.
meanings.sent2: I love the fizzy sensation of soda on my tongue.
meanings.sent3: The fizzy bubbles in the drink made it dance in the glass.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as fizzy as a freshly opened soda can.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy soda popped and fizzed like tiny fireworks.

meanings.sent1: The stars in the sky looked fizzy on that clear night.
meanings.sent2: Her personality is as fizzy as a glass of champagne.
meanings.sent3: The fizzy glitter on the card made it shine brightly.
meanings.sent4: The fizzy excitement in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy water sparkled like diamonds in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Producing bubbles or foam when shaken or opened
meanings.sent1: The fizzy bottle sprayed foam everywhere when opened.
meanings.sent2: The fizzy soap bubbled up in the sink.
meanings.sent3: The fizzy shampoo made her hair look like a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The fizzy reaction was like a mini science experiment.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy bath bomb created a bubbly paradise in the tub.
